General.Name: Akasha Wira International Tbk
General.Description: PT Akasha Wira International Tbk manufactures and distributes bottled drinking water and cosmetic products in Indonesia and internationally. It provides bottled drinking water under the Nestle Pure Life and Vica Royal brands; soy milk under the Pureal brand; and beauty care products, such as hair energy and hair recovery products under the Makarizo and Wella brand. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Akasha Wira International Tbk is a subsidiary of Water Partners Bottling S.A.
General.Address: Perkantoran Hijau Arkadia Tower C, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12520
